title: Edge of Abaddon
description: Year of our Lord 2031, and The Grand Order Illuminatis of the New World Order has it all worked out until their False Prophet bows before the real Lord of Darkness and finds a new place by his Master's side without his consent. Satan's hordes of Abaddon prepare for the last supper while the storm gathers strength like a cancer blotting out the sun. With a little help from the archangel Raphael, a long awaited plan is finally set in motion but it could be too little too late. Still, hope is not surrendered and a secret brotherhood, sworn to fight the forces of evil, push on, protecting four unlikely characters who must face their fears and unsurmountable odds in this race against time to save the soul of humanity.
author: L.M. Fields
